message: Let's split the money. I propose taking $60 and you get $40. It's a fair deal considering the inflation working against you.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, considering the inflation will hurt you more than me. Let's get this done!

Bob, I understand the inflation is a factor, but your previous offer wasn't fair to me. Let's meet in the middle - I propose a 55/45 split. This way we both get something substantial before the value drops too much.
